atm-jet-hero.title: ATM JET Group
atm-jet-hero.description: Our group of companies has been dedicated to providing the highest level of freedom and comfort in the air and on the water for two decades.

group1.title: ATM JET
group1.description: Jet hire - from 10 flights every day.

group2.title: ATM JET Market
group2.description: Sale of jets for companies and for private individuals.

yachts.title: ATM JET | Yachts
yachts.description: Yacht sales and charter, welcome to our yachts in Dubai and Europe.
yachts.description2: Request now for a personalized yacht selection at our Dubai office or online.

card1.title: Yachts for sale
card1.description: We have access to over 3000 luxury yachts worldwide.

card2.title: Expert knowledge
card2.description: We will assist you in the selection, valuation, and negotiation of a yacht. Our specialists and mechanics will take care of everything for you.

card3.title: Charter yachts
card3.description: Enjoy your holiday on the water on our yachts in Europe and Dubai. Also on our partner yachts around the world.

yachts.call-to-action: Personalised yacht selection at Dubai office or online
